channel.title: Cache Help
channel.description: Hello I am trying to figure out where to put the cache I downloaded. I have never ran a server with a cache before and I am new to this whole process, if anyone can just tell me where to put the cache file or give me a basic tutorial or link to a tutorial, that would be very helpful! Thanks!

item.title: Cache Help
item.dc:creator: @nardoscape nardoscape
item.description:
@nardoscape wrote:

Thanks a ton man! appreciate it

Read full topic

item.title: Cache Help
item.dc:creator: @Tmesis Tmesis
item.description:
@Tmesis wrote:

If you have a sign or signlink.java you can check the (usually named) findCacheDir() method. It will look something like this:

private static String findcachedir()
    {
        return "./cache/";
    }

If it says ./cache/ then it means the cache needs to be placed in the client folder. If it says C:/ then it needs to be put in your C drive. If youâ€™re stuck post your sign/signlink code here. You will have to make sure the cache is named the same as what the method is looking for, case sensitive.

Read full topic
